column6: 2015. she was a member of black oak heights baptist church
column7: and a 1949 graduate of powell high school. she was an employee of s. h. kress and retired from the internal revenue service. she was an avid gardener. preceded in death by infant daughter
column8: sharon kay. she is survived by husband of sixty years

column15: kori leigh flynn; and several nieces and nephews. the family would like to offer special thanks to courtyard garden villas and amedisys hospice. the family will receive friends from 5:00 pm until 7:00 pm thursday
